title: Altcoin of the Week: July 19 - July 25
body:
Dear fans,

The second proposal is here! The council has received your suggestions and has reached a consensus. Do you have your $CND lock and loaded? If not, acquire them here:

https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x022dbE7FE889FE5353DB6d5c63D7dC2c13D38f29


Please vote below on the altcoins we should look into next week.


HOW QUADRATIC VOTING WORKS

You may choose as many options as you'd like. Each vote on each option increases the cost of voting quadratically (power of 2). Therefore, the more times you vote in one option, the more costly it is.


REQUIREMENTS

- Minimum of 0.000000001 CND
- You've bought $CND prior to the proposal creation date

VOTING DATES

- Start: 12/07/21 23:00 UTC
- End: 18/07/21 15:00 UTC
author: 0x985A27EC406539F569362D9D5D3681D3A08b5f72
